item.title: How to Reduce Monthly Expenses A Practical Guide for Real Life
item.description: Before you can start cutting costs, you need to figure out where your money is actually going. It sounds obvious, but most of us have only a vague idea. This first step isn’t about making drastic changes; it’s about getting an honest, clear picture of your spending habits.
